医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
超声波控制的 CRISPR 为治疗遗传性疾病提供了精确性借助 CRISPR，我们的医学专家很快就能对如何治疗和预防一些最具挑战性的遗传性疾病和疾病拥有前所未有的控制力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Ultrasound-control-CRISPR-offers- precision-in-treating-genic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Ultrasound-control-CRISPR-offers- precision-in-treating-genic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=466a96e5-513f-4d2d-aed7-56267d21866a Wed, 04 Dec 2024 13:14:00 -0500 Ultrasound-controlled CRISPR offers precision in treating genetic disorders
新发现为治疗侵袭性腺样囊性癌带来了希望2024 年 11 月 22 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新社论，题为“B7-H4：腺样囊性癌的潜在治疗靶点”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-discovery-offers-hope-for-treating-aggressive-adenoid-cystic-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-discovery-offers-hope-for-treating-aggressive-adenoid-cystic-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4e4179f-7e2e-46ce-b6a6-a24ccbb2af6d Wed, 04 Dec 2024 12:56:11 -0500 New discovery offers hope for treating aggressive adenoid cystic carcinoma
慢性阻塞性肺病患者的观点应指导新疗法的开发一篇新评论称，慢性阻塞性肺疾病 (COPD) 患者的观点和优先事项应纳入 COPD 新疗法的开发过程中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/COPD-病人-perspectives-should-guide-development-of-new-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/COPD-病人-perspectives-should-guide-development-of-new-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b16f38c-ddbc-4ac4-b561-a018ff5b623b Wed, 04 Dec 2024 12:42:02 -0500 COPD patients' perspectives should guide development of new therapies
美国心脏协会发起改善肥厚型心肌病护理的倡议据估计，美国每 500 人中就有 1 人患有肥厚性心肌病 (HCM) -；最常见的遗传性心脏病——；许多人并不知道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/American-Heart-Association-launches-initiative-to-improve-hypertropic-cardiomyopathy-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/American-Heart-Association-launches-initiative-to-improve-hypertropic-cardiomyopathy-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28f7b573-a378-485e-b8fe-13b8946677b3 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 12:34:34 -0500 American Heart Association launches initiative to improve hypertrophic cardiomyopathy care
研究强调女运动员 ACL 损伤率指标存在偏差哈佛大学性别科学实验室在《英国运动医学杂志》上发表的一项新研究揭示了用于估计运动中 ACL 损伤率性别差异的关键指标存在系统偏差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Study-highlights-bias-in-ACL-injury-rate-metrics-for-women-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Study-highlights-bias-in-ACL-injury-rate-metrics-for-women-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48315a32-236a-4ad9-a2b9-4f4f86249bd7 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 12:26:57 -0500 Study highlights bias in ACL injury rate metrics for women athletes
新研究揭示了猴子如何避免乙型肝炎感染乙型肝炎病毒 (HBV) 感染是慢性肝病的主要原因，通过血液或体液在个体之间传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-research-sheds-light-on-how-monkeys-avoid-hepatitis-B-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-research-sheds-light-on-how-monkeys-avoid-hepatitis-B-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cde5a7d1-59f4-4c2d-9cd0-7d67461497a8 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 12:19:24 -0500 New research sheds light on how monkeys avoid hepatitis B infection
肿瘤分泌的DNA触发针对肝转移的免疫反应特殊...威尔康奈尔医学院、纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心和韩国延世大学的研究人员领导的一项研究表明，肿瘤细胞分泌的特殊包装的 DNA 可以触发免疫反应，抑制肿瘤向肝脏的转移性扩散。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Tumor-secreted-DNA-triggers-immune-response-against-liver-metastasis-Special.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Tumor-secreted-DNA-triggers-immune-response-against-liver-metastasis-Special.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16980c56-74c0-4fe7-9244-887f5d57d67a Wed, 04 Dec 2024 11:42:03 -0500 Tumor secreted DNA triggers immune response against liver metastasis Special...
Peter Falkai 教授提出了精神分裂症治疗的有希望的新方向在基因组新闻综合采访中，杰出精神病学家 Peter Falkai 教授通过他对大脑可塑性和髓磷脂再生的突破性研究，提出了精神分裂症治疗的有希望的新方向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Professor-Peter-Falkai-suggests-promising-new-directions-in-schizophrenia-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Professor-Peter-Falkai-suggests-promising-new-directions-in-schizophrenia-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bed2d1d3-311d-47b8-9031-ba480a302ece Wed, 04 Dec 2024 11:33:32 -0500 Professor Peter Falkai suggests promising new directions in schizophrenia treatment
生物标志物的发现为积极的乳腺癌治疗带来了希望瑞典隆德大学领导的一项新研究解决了一个多年来的谜团：哪些患有侵袭性乳腺癌的患者可以得到一种一直在开发但被搁置的靶向癌症治疗的帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Biomarker-discovery-offers-hope-for-aggressive-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Biomarker-discovery-offers-hope-for-aggressive-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4cfafdb-943f-4d05-a6d9-07f4ddded0e0 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 11:12:00 -0500 Biomarker discovery offers hope for aggressive breast cancer treatment
新颖的单细胞基因组学分析方法提供了对细胞周期和增殖的直接见解通过从单细胞基因组学推断增殖率，SPRINTER 增强了对肿瘤进化的理解并识别了癌症进展中的关键克隆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Novel-single-cell-genomics-analysis-approach-provides-direct-insights-into-cell-cycle-and-proliferation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Novel-single-cell-genomics-analysis-approach-provides-direct-insights-into-cell-cycle-and-proliferation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ced4eb58-ecbd-4b46-8696-de27a776cdf6 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 10:21:00 -0500 Novel single-cell genomics analysis approach provides direct insights into cell cycle and proliferation
